dx-text The text component makes it easy to do ad-hoc styling and responsive behaviors. <!-- Attributes: - [prop]=[value] - [css-prop]--[breakpoint]:[psuedo-element]="[css-value]" --> <!-- Basic flexbox --> <dx-text>Hello World</dx-text> <!-- font size of 21px with white text that turns red on hover --> <dx-text font-size="21px" color="white" color:hover="red">Hello World</dx-text>
